net.java.jddac.jmdi.service
Class CommFabric

java.lang.Object
  net.java.jddac.jmdi.service.CommFabric

public class CommFabric
extends java.lang.Object

The CommFabric class is a singleton class for remote and local communication. It supports local publish/subscribe, publish to a remote server, and client messaging to local or remote blocks.
Messages are contained in an ArgArray object. Every message has a MessageAttr.DEST element and a MessageAttr.VALUE element. The MessageAttr.DEST contains a JddacId with the destination and type of the message. The MessageAttr.VALUE contains an ArgArray with the contents of the message.

See Also:
JddacId

addMessageListener

public void addMessageListener(int deliveryRestrictions,
                               java.lang.Boolean localNcap,
                               java.lang.String type,
                               java.lang.String path,
                               int mlId,
                               CommListener mlObj)
Adds the specified message listener to receive selected messages. The messages to be received by this listener are restricted based on the first 4 parameters. The mlId parameter is passed to the listener when a message is received. The deliveryRestrictions parameter is a set of flags (DR_) that specify where in the delivery order the listener is to be called and what delivery restrictions apply. The default is DR_NORMAL and DR_NOT_DELIVERED. The localNcap, type, and path restrict which messages the listener receives based on the destination JddacId. If any of these parameters are null, then there is no restriction for that part of the JddacId.

Parameters:
deliveryRestrictions - - any combination of DR flags
localNcap - - restrict to local NCAP if true, non-local NCAP if false, or no restriction if NULL
type - restrict to this type of message, or no restriction if NULL
path - restrict to this path, or no restriction if NULL
mlId - identifier passed to message listener
mlObj - message listener to receive selected messages
See Also:
CommListener, JddacId

addMessageListener

public void addMessageListener(java.util.Vector commSubList,
                               CommListener mlObj)
Parses the passed in commSubList and adds the specified message listener to receive selected messages.

Parameters:
commSubList - a Vector list specifying comm fabric subscriptions
mlObj - message listener to receive selected messages.

removeMessageListener

public void removeMessageListener(int mlId,
                                  CommListener mlObj)
Removes the specified message listener. The mlId and mlObj must match the values passed to addMessageListener.

Parameters:
mlId - id passed to addMessageListener
mlObj - message listener passed to addMessageListener

removeMessageListener

public void removeMessageListener(java.util.Vector commSubList,
                                  CommListener mlObj)
Parses the passed in commSubList and removes the specified message listener.

Parameters:
commSubList - a Vector list specifying comm fabric subscriptions
mlObj - message listener to remove from receiving messages.

                                        java.lang.String topic,
                                        ArgArray value)
Creates a directed publication message ArgArray.

Parameters:
ncapId - - a JddacId with the identity set to the NCAP to direct the pub too.
topic - topic to publish message too.
value - value of publication.
Returns:
a message ArgArray of the pubication.

createClientMessage

public static ArgArray createClientMessage(JddacId dest,
                                           java.lang.String opId,
                                           ArgArray value,
                                           JddacId from,
                                           java.lang.String retOpId)
Creates a client message ArgArray.

Parameters:
dest - JddacId of Entity to send message to.
value - parameters of method.
from - JddacId of sender, or null for don't return result.
retOpId - Operation ID for returned result, or null.
Returns:
a message ArgArray of the pubication.
